location.address: Computer Deconstruction Lab, Building 9059, 2201 Marconi Road, Wall Township, N.J. 07719, USA

ext_weather.name: Tonight
ext_weather.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Isolated Showers And Thunderstorms
ext_weather.detailedForecast: Isolated showers and thunderstorms between midnight and 2am, then scattered showers and thunderstorms between 2am and 5am, then scattered showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 68. South wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
